<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-linkallir-h-/forcevmcorelinking"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-linkallir-h-/forcevmcorelinking/#ae759e46625e36958cdbedc98a7bdc135">ForceVMCoreLinking</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We must reference VMCore in such a way that compilers will not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// delete it all as dead code, even with whole program optimization,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// yet is effectively a NO-OP. As the compiler isn&#39;t smart enough</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to know that getenv() never returns -1, this will do the job.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is so that globals in the translation units where these functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are defined are forced to be initialized, populating various</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::getenv(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;bar&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) != (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#42;) -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">llvm::LLVMContext</a> Context;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (void)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">llvm::Module</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Context);</span></CodeLine>
